rooms.description: A welcoming space with minimalistic design and floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural light.

Contemporary open space with integrated seating areas and high ceiling with floor-to-ceiling windows for an airy ambiance. The room also features built-in storage solutions following Vastu guidelines to ensure positive energy flow.
An open dining area adjacent to the living space with floor-to-ceiling windows that allow ample natural light and a view of the surrounding greenery, promoting healthy eating environment.

Modern kitchen design with ample counter space, efficient layout, and large windows for enhanced ventilation. Consideration is given to Vastu principles regarding the placement of water and fire elements.

openings.details: Large double door entrance with floor-to-ceiling glass panels integrating natural light into the foyer.
Balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows offering views and ventilation, in line with contemporary design standards.
